qas.question: Who analyzes rock samples from drill cores in the lab?
Who dates rocks, precisely, within the stratigraphic section?
Why is it important to precisely date rocks within the stratigraphic section?

answers.text: provide better absolute bounds on the timing and rates of deposition
provide better absolute bounds on the timing and rates of deposition

qas.question: What types of scientists looks for signs of magnetic reversals in igneous rocks within the drill cores?
What do geochronologists analyze fossils from drill cores for?
What do outcrop samples help magnetic stratigraphers to date?

What do magnetic straitigraphers precisely date?

qas.question: What do geochronologists look for in drill cores?

plausible_answers.text: rock samples from outcrop and drill cores

What do Magnetic stratigraphers use isotopes to study?
